topic: Impact of unexpected scientific discoveries on energy policy
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that unexpected discoveries often lie in areas where I have entrenched beliefs or where I have not previously looked. To address this, my next step is to actively seek out perspectives and information outside my usual sources, engaging with diverse viewpoints and exploring topics I typically overlook. This action will likely highlight areas where I hold biases or assumptions, fostering growth and potentially leading to innovative insights.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
